title: User Registration with Email and Password
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully using an email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid email and password
Submit the registration form
Check that registration is successful and user is navigated to profile completion screen

title: Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check login is successful when correct email and password are entered.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email and corresponding password
Click login button
Verify user is logged in and navigated to main inventory screen

title: Login with Incorrect Credentials
description: Ensure login fails appropriately with invalid email or password and an error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email or password
Click login button
Verify error message is displayed and user remains on login page

title: Google Sign-In Authentication Flow
description: Verify users can authenticate using their Google account and access the app.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen
Click on 'Sign in with Google' button
Complete the Google authentication process
Verify successful login and navigation to profile completion or main screen

title: Password Recovery Workflow
description: Check that users can recover their password through the password recovery flow and receive recovery instructions.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Click 'Forgot Password' link
Enter registered email address
Submit password recovery request
Verify confirmation message is shown instructing user to check email

title: Manual Product Addition with Valid Input
description: Verify that users can add a new product manually with all required fields and it appears correctly in inventory.

steps.description: Navigate to add product screen
Input product name, category, expiration date, and other required details manually
Submit the product addition form
Verify the product appears in inventory with correct details

title: Add Product via Barcode Scanning
description: Ensure product can be added by scanning barcode and the scanned information populates product details correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to add product screen
Initiate barcode scanning and scan valid product barcode
Verify scanned product information is populated in the form fields
Complete any missing required fields
Submit the product addition form
Verify product is added to inventory with correct details

title: Add Product with OCR Expiration Date Entry
description: Verify that the OCR-powered photo input correctly extracts expiration date and other product info for product addition.

steps.description: Navigate to add product screen
Use OCR feature to capture product expiration date from photo
Verify extracted expiration date and other details populate form accurately
Submit the product addition form
Confirm the product is listed in inventory with correct expiration date

title: Edit ProductCard Details
description: Check that existing product details can be edited via the ProductCard component and updates persist.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory screen
Select an existing product to open ProductCard view
Edit product details such as expiration date or category
Save changes
Verify the updated details are visible in inventory and persisted after app restart

title: Push Notifications for Upcoming Expiration
description: Verify that push notifications are triggered appropriately for products nearing expiration according to user settings.

steps.description: Add product with expiration date within notification threshold
Ensure push notification permissions are granted
Verify notification is received prior to product expiration as per configuration

title: Push Notification for Same-Day Expirations
description: Ensure that products expiring on the current day trigger immediate push notifications and notifications update after product edits.

steps.description: Add product with expiration date set to today
Confirm push notification permissions are enabled
Verify immediate push notification is received for the product
Edit product to change expiration date
Confirm notification schedule updates accordingly

title: Handle Notification Permissions Disabled
description: Verify app detects when push notification permissions are disabled and appropriately prompts user to enable them.

steps.description: Deny push notification permissions at OS level
Add product with impending expiration
Verify app displays prompt guiding user to enable notification permissions

title: Mark Product as Consumed
description: Validate that users can mark products as consumed and that inventory updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory
Select a product and mark it as consumed
Verify product status changes to consumed and is removed or marked accordingly in inventory

title: View Consumption History
description: Confirm that the consumption history screen displays all past consumed products accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to consumption history screen
Verify all consumed products appear in history with correct timestamps

title: Undo Consumption Action
description: Ensure that the user can undo the last consumption marking and the product is restored to inventory.

steps.description: Mark a product as consumed
Use undo option within allowed timeframe
Verify product is restored to inventory and removed from consumption history

title: Create, Edit, and Delete Custom Categories
description: Test full lifecycle of user-customized categories: creation, modification, and deletion.

steps.description: Navigate to category management screen
Create a new custom category
Verify the new category is listed and selectable
Edit the custom category name or properties
Verify edited details are saved and updated in filters
Delete the custom category
Verify the category is removed from management and product filters

title: Filter Products by Category
description: Check that filtering the product inventory list by both predefined and custom categories works correctly and updates view accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to product inventory screen
Apply filter with a predefined category
Verify only products belonging to the selected category are shown
Apply filter with a user-created custom category
Verify the filtered product list reflects the custom category selection

title: App Launch Performance Test
description: Ensure that the application launches within 3 seconds on supported devices.

steps.description: Launch the app on supported iOS and Android device
Verify app main screen is fully rendered within 3 seconds

title: Smooth Navigation Performance
description: Verify that screen transitions are responsive and no lag occurs during navigation throughout the app.

steps.description: Navigate between major screens: inventory, add product, categories, consumption history, and settings
Verify transitions are smooth and meet standard responsiveness expectations

title: Enforce Data Security via Supabase RLS and HTTPS
description: Confirm all user data is isolated properly following Supabase Row Level Security policies and all server communications use HTTPS.

steps.description: Attempt to access data belonging to other users via the app or API
Verify that access is blocked by RLS policies
Monitor network traffic during app operations
Verify all data is transmitted exclusively over HTTPS connections

title: Real-Time Data Synchronization Across Devices
description: Validate that inventory, consumption, and category changes made on one device immediately reflect on other devices logged into the same account.

steps.description: Log in with the same user account on two separate devices
Make product additions, edits, or consumption marking on Device A
Verify changes appear on Device B in near real-time without manual refresh

title: UI Support for Light and Dark Themes
description: Ensure the application UI renders correctly and is visually consistent in both light and dark modes according to platform guidelines on iOS and Android.

steps.description: Switch app themes between light and dark in settings
Verify all screens and components update color schemes appropriately without visual glitches
Test on both iOS and Android devices
Confirm compliance with respective platform’s design guidelines for themes

title: Crash Rate Validation Under Normal Operation
description: Monitor app stability and confirm crash rate remains below 1% during normal usage across supported devices.

steps.description: Simulate normal user workflows including authentication, product management, notifications, and category filtering
Verify no crashes occur or crash rate is below 1% within defined test period
